reviewText: I got this DVD package for my history class because we were looking at American presidents. It helped out a lot and I was able to do a great term paper based on the films that are caputered here. Teddy Roosevelt was first a famous soldier and then became president after serviing with the rough riders. My teacher loved teh disks too and asked to borrow them next year for her class again.
"I'm definitely a happy customer, and have already referred a few friends to your site, as well as my kids' teachers :-)"
"Thanks again for many happy and informative hours on my computer. I will be telling all history buffs I know about your products!"
